              class Connection < ActionCable::Connection::Base
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

                identified_by :current_user
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

                def connect
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

                  self.current_user = find_user!
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8.

                def find_user!
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                  token = request.params["token"] || request.headers["Authorization"]&.split&.last
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                  if token.blank?
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                    reject_unauthorized_connection
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                    return
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                  begin
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                    payload = JWT.decode(token, Rails.application.credentials.secret_key_base, true, algorithm: "HS256")
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                    user_id = payload.first["user_id"]
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Check token expiration
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                    if payload.first["exp"] && payload.first["exp"] < Time.current.to_i
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                      reject_unauthorized_connection
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                      return
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                    User.find(user_id)
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                  rescue JWT::DecodeError, ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                    reject_unauthorized_connection
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33.

            class ListChannel < ApplicationCable::Channel
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

              def subscribed
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

                @list = List.find(params[:list_id])
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

                reject if @list.blank?
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

                reject unless current_user.memberships.exists?(list_id: @list.id)
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

                stream_for @list
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

              end

    8.

                  def create

    31. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      32.

                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    if coach_email.blank? && client_email.blank?

      34.

    37. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                      # coach invites client
          
      38.

                      invited_by = "coach"

      44.

                      # client invites coach
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                      client = current_user

                  else: 0
                
              
            

                      return render json: { error: { message: "You cannot invite yourself" } }, status: :unprocessable_entity if coach.id == client.id
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                      invited_by = "client"
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    if CoachingRelationship.exists?(coach_id: coach.id, client_id: client.id)
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                      return render json: { error: { message: "Relationship already exists" } }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                    rel = CoachingRelationship.new(
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                      coach: coach,
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                      client: client,
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                      invited_by: invited_by,
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                      status: "pending"
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                    )
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                    if rel.save
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

                      safe_notify(:coaching_invitation_sent, rel)
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: CoachingRelationshipSerializer.new(rel, current_user: current_user).as_json, status: :created
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    else
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

                      validation_error!(rel.errors)
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

                  # PATCH /api/v1/coaching_relationships/:id/accept
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def accept
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                    return not_found! unless @relationship && participant?(@relationship, current_user)
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                    return forbidden!("You cannot accept this invitation") unless invitee?(@relationship, current_user)
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                    return forbidden!("You cannot accept this invitation") unless @relationship.status.to_s == "pending"
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

                    @relationship.update!(status: "active", accepted_at: Time.current)
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

                    safe_notify(:coaching_invitation_accepted, @relationship)
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: CoachingRelationshipSerializer.new(@relationship, current_user: current_user).as_json, status: :ok
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

                  # PATCH /api/v1/coaching_relationships/:id/decline
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def decline
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                    return not_found! unless @relationship && participant?(@relationship, current_user)
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                    return forbidden!("You cannot decline this invitation") unless invitee?(@relationship, current_user)
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                    return forbidden!("You cannot decline this invitation") unless @relationship.status.to_s == "pending"
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

                    @relationship.update!(status: "declined")
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

                    safe_notify(:coaching_invitation_declined, @relationship)
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

                    head :no_content
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

                  # PATCH /api/v1/coaching_relationships/:id/update_preferences
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def update_preferences
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                    return not_found! unless @relationship && participant?(@relationship, current_user)
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                    return forbidden!("Only coaches can update preferences") unless current_user.id == @relationship.coach_id
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    src = params[:coaching_relationship].is_a?(ActionController::Parameters) ? params[:coaching_relationship] : params
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

                    changes = {}
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    changes[:notify_on_completion]      = to_bool(src[:notify_on_completion])      if src.key?(:notify_on_completion)
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    changes[:notify_on_missed_deadline] = to_bool(src[:notify_on_missed_deadline]) if src.key?(:notify_on_missed_deadline)
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    changes[:send_daily_summary]        = to_bool(src[:send_daily_summary])        if src.key?(:send_daily_summary)
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    if src.key?(:daily_summary_time)
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                      if src[:daily_summary_time].present?
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                        hhmm = parse_hhmm(src[:daily_summary_time])
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                        return render json: { error: { message: "Validation failed", details: { daily_summary_time: [ "must be in HH:MM format" ] } } }, status: :unprocessable_entity unless hhmm
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

                        changes[:daily_summary_time] = hhmm
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                      else
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                        # allow clearing with empty string / nil
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

                        changes[:daily_summary_time] = nil
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Persist either in serialized preferences hash or direct attributes
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                    if @relationship.respond_to?(:preferences) && @relationship.preferences.is_a?(Hash)
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

                      @relationship.preferences = (@relationship.preferences || {}).merge(changes.stringify_keys)
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    else
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                      changes.each do |k, v|
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

                        setter = "#{k}="
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                        if @relationship.respond_to?(setter)
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                          if k == :daily_summary_time && v.present?
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                            # Convert string time to Time object for database storage
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

                            time_parts = v.split(":")
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

                            time_obj = Time.zone.parse("#{time_parts[0]}:#{time_parts[1]}")
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

                            @relationship.public_send(setter, time_obj)
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                          else
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

                            @relationship.public_send(setter, v)
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

                          end
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

                        end
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

                    @relationship.save!
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: {
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

                      id: @relationship.id,
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

                      notify_on_completion:      current_pref(:notify_on_completion),
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

                      notify_on_missed_deadline: current_pref(:notify_on_missed_deadline),
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

                      send_daily_summary:        current_pref(:send_daily_summary),
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

                      daily_summary_time:        format_hhmm(current_pref(:daily_summary_time))
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
            

                    }, status: :ok
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

                  # DELETE /api/v1/coaching_relationships/:id
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def destroy
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                    return not_found! unless @relationship
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                    return forbidden!("Unauthorized") unless participant?(@relationship, current_user)
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

                    @relationship.destroy!
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

                    head :no_content
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  private
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def require_auth!
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    return if current_user.present?
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: { error: { message: "Unauthorized" } }, status: :unauthorized
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def set_relationship
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

                    @relationship = CoachingRelationship.find_by(id: params[:id])
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def participant?(rel, user)
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
            

                    rel.coach_id == user.id || rel.client_id == user.id
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def invitee?(rel, user)
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    rel.invited_by == "coach" ? (rel.client_id == user.id) : (rel.coach_id == user.id)
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

                  # ---------- response helpers ----------
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def not_found!(msg = "Coaching relationship not found")
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: { error: { message: msg } }, status: :not_found
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def forbidden!(msg)
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: { error: { message: msg } }, status: :forbidden
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def validation_error!(details_hash)
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: { error: { message: "Validation failed", details: details_hash.as_json } }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            
              
            

                  # ---------- lookups / coercion / formatting ----------
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def normalize_email(email)
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            
              
            

                    email.to_s.strip.downcase.presence
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def find_user_ci(email)
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            
              
            

                    e = email.to_s.strip
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    return nil if e.blank?
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            
              
            

                    User.where("LOWER(email) = ?", e.downcase).first
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def to_bool(val)
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    return val if val == true || val == false
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            
              
            

                    s = val.to_s.strip.downcase
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    return true  if %w[true 1 yes y t on].include?(s)
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    return false if %w[false 0 no n f off].include?(s)
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            
              
            

                    nil
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            
              
            

                  # returns "HH:MM" or nil for invalid
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def parse_hhmm(val)
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            
              
            

                    s = val.to_s.strip
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                    return nil unless s =~ /\A([01]?\d|2[0-3]):[0-5]\d\z/
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            
              
            

                    hh, mm = s.split(":")
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            
              
            

                    format("%02d:%02d", hh.to_i, mm.to_i)
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      214.

                  def format_hhmm(val)

                  else: 0

      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0

                  def calculate_average_completion_time(user)

    111. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    return 0 if tasks.none?
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

                    total_diff = tasks.sum { |t| (t.completed_at - t.due_at).abs }
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

                    (total_diff / tasks.count / 3600).round(1) # Convert to hours
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def recent_activity_summary
          
      119.

                    # Get recent task events for the user with proper includes to avoid N+1
          
      120.

                                             .joins(:task)

                  def upcoming_deadlines_summary

    139. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Get tasks due in the next 7 days

                    upcoming_tasks = Task.joins(:list)

    141. 
            

            
              
            

                                        .where(lists: { user_id: current_user.id })
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

                                        .where(status: :pending)

    143. 
            

            
              
            

                                        .where("tasks.due_at BETWEEN ? AND ?", Time.current, ConfigurationHelper.upcoming_deadlines_period.from_now)

                        days_until_due: ((task.due_at - Time.current) / 1.day).round(1)

                  def recent_client_activity_summary
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Get recent activity across all clients with proper includes to avoid N+1
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

                    recent_events = TaskEvent.includes(:task, task: { list: :owner })
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

                                             .joins(:task)
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

                                             .where(tasks: { list: current_user.clients.joins(:owned_lists).select("lists.id") })
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

                                             .where("task_events.created_at >= ?", ConfigurationHelper.recent_activity_period.ago)
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

                                             .order(created_at: :desc)
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

                                             .limit(10)
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166.

                  def calculate_average_client_completion_rate
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            
              
            

                    clients = current_user.clients
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    return 0 if clients.empty?
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Optimize with single query instead of N+1
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            
              
            

                    client_ids = clients.pluck(:id)
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            
              
            

                    task_stats = Task.joins(:list)
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
            

                                     .where(lists: { user_id: client_ids })
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            
              
            

                                     .group("lists.user_id")
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            
              
            

                                     .select("lists.user_id, COUNT(*) as total_tasks, SUM(CASE WHEN tasks.status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as completed_tasks")
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            
              
            

                    stats_by_client = task_stats.index_by(&:user_id)
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            
              
            

                    total_completion_rate = clients.sum do |client|
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            
              
            

                      stats = stats_by_client[client.id]
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                      next 0 unless stats && stats.total_tasks.to_i > 0
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            
              
            

                      (stats.completed_tasks.to_f / stats.total_tasks.to_i * 100).round(1)
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            
              
            

                    (total_completion_rate / clients.count).round(1)
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def client_performance_summary
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Optimize with single query instead of N+1
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            
              
            

                    clients = current_user.clients
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            
              
            

                    client_ids = clients.pluck(:id)
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Single query to get all task statistics
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            
              
            

                    task_stats = Task.joins(:list)
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            
              
            

                                     .where(lists: { user_id: client_ids })
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            
              
            

                                     .group("lists.user_id")
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            
              
            

                                     .select('lists.user_id,
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            
              
            

                                              COUNT(*) as total_tasks,
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            
              
            

                                              SUM(CASE WHEN tasks.status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as completed_tasks,
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            
              
            

                                              SUM(CASE WHEN tasks.status = 0 AND tasks.due_at < NOW() THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as overdue_tasks')
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            
              
            

                    stats_by_client = task_stats.index_by(&:user_id)
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            
              
            

                    clients.map do |client|
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            
              
            

                      stats = stats_by_client[client.id]
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            
              
            

                      {
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            
              
            

                        client_id: client.id,
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            
              
            

                        client_name: client.name,
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                        total_tasks: stats&.total_tasks || 0,
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                        completed_tasks: stats&.completed_tasks || 0,
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                        overdue_tasks: stats&.overdue_tasks || 0,
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                        completion_rate: (stats && stats.total_tasks.to_i > 0) ? (stats.completed_tasks.to_f / stats.total_tasks.to_i * 100).round(1) : 0
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            
              
            

                      }
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      233.

                  def create
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Debug logging
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.info "Device registration params: #{params.inspect}"
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.info "APNS token value: '#{params[:apns_token]}' (blank?: #{params[:apns_token].blank?})"
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Handle both nested and direct parameter formats
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                    device_attributes = if params[:device].present?
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                      device_params
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                    else
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                      # Always generate a token if none provided or if it's blank/empty
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                      apns_token = if params[:apns_token].present? && !params[:apns_token].blank? && !params[:apns_token].empty?
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                        params[:apns_token]
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                      else
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                        "dev_token_#{SecureRandom.hex(16)}"
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.info "Using APNS token: #{apns_token}"
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                      {
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                        apns_token: apns_token,
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                        platform: params[:platform].present? ? params[:platform] : "ios",
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                        bundle_id: params[:bundle_id].present? ? params[:bundle_id] : "com.example.app",
          
      39.

                        fcm_token: params[:fcm_token]
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                      }
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Find existing device by token or create new one
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                    @device = current_user.devices.find_or_initialize_by(apns_token: device_attributes[:apns_token])

                    @device.assign_attributes(device_attributes)
          
      46.

      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                    if @device.save
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: DeviceSerializer.new(@device).as_json, status: :created
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    else
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "Validation failed", details: @device.errors.full_messages } }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      51.

                    end

                  def register

                  def permission_params

      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

                    permitted.to_h.transform_values do |v|
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                      case v
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                      when true, false then v
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

                      when nil, ""     then false
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                      else
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

                        v.to_s.strip.downcase.in?(%w[true yes on 1])
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
