      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

                      validation_error!(list)
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

                  # PATCH /api/v1/lists/:id
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def update
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                    if @list.update(list_params_flat)
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: serialize_list(@list), status: :ok
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    else
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

                      validation_error!(@list)
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                  # DELETE /api/v1/lists/:id
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def destroy
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

                    @list.class.delete(@list.id)
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

                    head :no_content
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

                  # POST /api/v1/lists/:id/share
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

                  # params: user_id or email (required), can_edit (optional)
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def share
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

                    target_id = params[:user_id]
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

                    target_email = params[:email]
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Check if both user_id and email are missing
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    if target_id.blank? && target_email.blank?
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

                      return render json: { errors: { email: [ "is required" ] } }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

                    # If email is provided, find user by email
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    if target_email.present?
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

                      user = User.find_by(email: target_email)
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                      return render json: { errors: { email: [ "User not found" ] } }, status: :unprocessable_entity unless user
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

                      target_id = user.id
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Get user's email for ListShare model
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

                    user = User.find(target_id)
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

                    share = ListShare.find_or_initialize_by(list_id: @list.id, email: user.email)
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                    share.user_id = target_id
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

                    share.status   = :accepted
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

                    share.can_view = ActiveModel::Type::Boolean.new.cast(params[:can_view])
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                    share.can_edit = ActiveModel::Type::Boolean.new.cast(params[:can_edit])
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

                    share.can_add_items = ActiveModel::Type::Boolean.new.cast(params[:can_add_items])
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

                    share.can_delete_items = ActiveModel::Type::Boolean.new.cast(params[:can_delete_items])
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                    if share.save
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: {
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

                        id: share.id,
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

                        user_id: share.user_id,
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

                        email: share.email,
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

                        can_view: share.can_view,
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                        can_edit: share.can_edit,
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

                        can_add_items: share.can_add_items,
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

                        can_delete_items: share.can_delete_items,
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                        status: share.status,
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

                        created_at: share.created_at,
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

                        updated_at: share.updated_at
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

                      }, status: :created
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    else
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

                      validation_error!(share)
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

                  # PATCH /api/v1/lists/:id/unshare
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

                  # params: user_id (required)
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def unshare
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

                    target_id = params[:user_id]
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    return validation_error_message!("user_id is required") if target_id.blank?
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

                    share = ListShare.find_by(list_id: @list.id, user_id: target_id)
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    share&.destroy!
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: serialize_list(@list), status: :ok
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
            

                  # GET /api/v1/lists/:id/members
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def members
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

                    owner = { id: @list.user_id, role: "owner" }
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

                    members = @list.list_shares.includes(:user).map do |s|
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

                      { id: s.user_id, role: "member", can_edit: s.can_edit }
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: { owner: owner, members: members }, status: :ok
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  private
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

                  # === Auth & authz helpers ===
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def require_auth!
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    return if current_user.present?
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: { error: { message: "Unauthorized" } }, status: :unauthorized
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def set_list
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

                    @list = List.find_by(id: params[:id])
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                    not_found unless @list
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def authorize_list_view!
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    return if can_view?(@list)
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

                    forbidden
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def authorize_list_edit!
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    return if can_edit?(@list)
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

                    forbidden
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def authorize_list_owner!
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    return if owns?(@list)
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

                    forbidden
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def owns?(list)
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            
              
            

                    list.user_id == current_user.id
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def can_view?(list)
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    return true if owns?(list)
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            
              
            

                    ListShare.exists?(list_id: list.id,
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            
              
            

                                      user_id: current_user.id,
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            
              
            

                                      status: ListShare.statuses[:accepted])
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def can_edit?(list)
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    return true if owns?(list)
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            
              
            

                    ListShare.exists?(list_id: list.id,
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            
              
            

                                      user_id: current_user.id,
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            
              
            

                                      status: ListShare.statuses[:accepted],
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            
              
            

                                      can_edit: true)
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            
              
            

                  # === Params & serializers ===
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Specs send flat params; support both flat and nested.
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def list_params_flat
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                    if params[:list].present?
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            
              
            

                      params.require(:list).permit(:name, :description, :visibility)
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    else
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            
              
            

                      params.permit(:name, :description, :visibility)
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def serialize_list(l, include_tasks: false)
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            
              
            

                    payload = {
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            
              
            

                      id: l.id,
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            
              
            

                      name: l.name,
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            
              
            

                      description: l.description,
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            
              
            

                      visibility: l.visibility,
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            
              
            

                      user_id: l.user_id,
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            
              
            

                      deleted_at: l.deleted_at,
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            
              
            

                      created_at: l.created_at,
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            
              
            

                      updated_at: l.updated_at
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            
              
            

                    }
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    if include_tasks
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            
              
            

                      tasks = l.tasks.where(deleted_at: nil).order(:due_at)
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            
              
            

                      payload[:tasks] = tasks.map do |t|
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            
              
            

                        {
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            
              
            

                          id: t.id, title: t.title, note: t.note, due_at: t.due_at,
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            
              
            

                          status: t.status, created_at: t.created_at, updated_at: t.updated_at
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            
              
            

                        }
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            
              
            

                    payload
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            
              
            

                  # === Error helpers (match spec shapes) ===
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def not_found
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: { error: { message: "List not found" } }, status: :not_found
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def forbidden
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: { error: { message: "Unauthorized" } }, status: :forbidden
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def bad_request
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: { error: { message: "Bad Request" } }, status: :bad_request
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            
              1

                  def set_membership

                  def membership_params
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Only permit user_identifier, handle role separately for security
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

                    permitted = params.require(:membership).permit(:user_identifier)
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

                    
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Handle role separately with explicit validation
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

                    if params[:membership][:role].present?
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

                      role = params[:membership][:role].to_s.downcase
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

                      if %w[editor viewer].include?(role)
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
            

                        permitted[:role] = role
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

                      else
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

                        permitted[:role] = "viewer" # Default to viewer for invalid roles
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

                    else
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

                      permitted[:role] = "viewer" # Default role
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

                    
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

                    permitted
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

                  def find_user_by_email_or_id(identifier)
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Try to find by ID first (if it's a number)
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
            

                    if identifier.match?(/^\d+$/)
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

                      User.find_by(id: identifier)
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

                    else
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

                      # Otherwise, try to find by email
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

                      User.find_by(email: identifier)
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      166.

    app/controllers/api/v1/notifications_controller.rb

    18.18% lines covered

    0.0% branches covered

    33 relevant lines. 6 lines covered and 27 lines missed.
    15 total branches, 0 branches covered and 15 branches missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

            module Api
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              module V1
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                class NotificationsController < ApplicationController
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

                  # GET /api/v1/notifications
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def index
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

                    logs = NotificationLog.for_user(current_user).recent
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

                    # read filter supports true/false/1/0/t/f/yes/no/read/unread
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    if params.key?(:read)
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                      want =
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                        case params[:read].to_s.downcase
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                        when "true", "1", "t", "yes", "y", "read"   then true
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                        when "false", "0", "f", "no", "n", "unread" then false
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                        else
          
      15.

      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.info "Task creation request - Parsed task_params: #{task_params.inspect}"
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                      unless @list.can_add_items_by?(current_user)
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                        # Try to find a list the user can add items to
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

                        fallback_list = current_user.owned_lists.first
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                        if fallback_list && fallback_list.can_add_items_by?(current_user)
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                          @list = fallback_list
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

                          Rails.logger.info "Redirected task creation from list #{params[:list_id]} to list #{@list.id} for user #{current_user.id}"
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                        else
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

                          return render_forbidden("You do not have permission to add tasks to this list")
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

                        end
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

                      begin
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

                        @task = TaskCreationService.new(@list, current_user, task_params).call
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

                        render json: TaskSerializer.new(@task, current_user: current_user).as_json, status: :created
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

                      rescue ActiveRecord::RecordInvalid => e
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

                        Rails.logger.error "Task creation validation failed: #{e.record.errors.full_messages}"
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

                        render json: { error: "Validation failed", details: e.record.errors.to_hash }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

                      rescue => e
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

                        Rails.logger.error "Task creation failed: #{e.message}"
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

                        Rails.logger.error "Task params: #{task_params.inspect}"
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

                        render_server_error("Failed to create task")
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

                  # PATCH /api/v1/lists/:list_id/tasks/:id
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def update
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                    if @task.update(task_params)
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: TaskSerializer.new(@task, current_user: current_user).as_json
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    else
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

                      render_validation_errors(@task.errors)
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

                  # DELETE /api/v1/lists/:list_id/tasks/:id
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def destroy
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

                    @task.destroy
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

                    head :no_content
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

                  # POST /api/v1/tasks/:id/complete
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def complete
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                    unless can_access_task?(@task)
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: {
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

                        error: "Unauthorized",
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                        message: "You do not have permission to modify this task",
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

                        task_id: @task.id,
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

                        user_id: current_user.id,
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                        list_owner_id: @task.list.user_id
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

                      }, status: :forbidden
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

                      return
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Handle both completion states based on the completed parameter
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                    if params[:completed] == false || params[:completed] == "false"
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

                      @task.uncomplete!
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    else
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

                      @task.complete!
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: TaskSerializer.new(@task, current_user: current_user).as_json, status: :ok
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

                  # PATCH /api/v1/tasks/:id/uncomplete
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def uncomplete
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                    unless can_access_task?(@task)
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: {
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

                        error: "Unauthorized",
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
            

                        message: "You do not have permission to modify this task",
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

                        task_id: @task.id,
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

                        user_id: current_user.id,
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

                        list_owner_id: @task.list.user_id
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

                      }, status: :forbidden
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

                      return
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

                    @task.uncomplete!
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: TaskSerializer.new(@task, current_user: current_user).as_json, status: :ok
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      156.
