                  # POST /api/v1/tasks/:id/reassign
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

                  # PATCH /api/v1/tasks/:id/reassign
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def reassign
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                    unless @task.list.user_id == current_user.id
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: "Forbidden" }, status: :forbidden
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

                      return
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

                    uid = params[:assigned_to]
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                    if Task.column_names.include?("assigned_to_id")
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                      @task.update!(assigned_to_id: uid)
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                    elsif Task.column_names.include?("assigned_to")
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
            

                      @task.update!(assigned_to: uid)
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    else
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "Task does not support assignment" } }, status: :unprocessable_content
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

                      return
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: TaskSerializer.new(@task, current_user: current_user).as_json, status: :ok
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

                  # POST /api/v1/tasks/:id/submit_explanation
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def submit_explanation
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                    unless @task.list.user_id == current_user.id
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: "Forbidden" }, status: :forbidden
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            
              
            

                      return
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
            

                    attrs = {}
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    if Task.column_names.include?("missed_reason")
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            
              
            

                      attrs[:missed_reason] = params[:missed_reason].to_s
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    if Task.column_names.include?("missed_reason_submitted_at")
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            
              
            

                      attrs[:missed_reason_submitted_at] = Time.current
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    if attrs.empty?
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "Task does not support missed-explanation fields" } }, status: :unprocessable_content
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            
              
            

                      return
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                    if @task.update(attrs)
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: TaskSerializer.new(@task, current_user: current_user).as_json, status: :ok
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    else
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { errors: @task.errors.to_hash }, status: :unprocessable_content
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            
              
            

                  # PATCH /api/v1/tasks/:id/toggle_visibility
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def toggle_visibility
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                    unless @task.list.user_id == current_user.id
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: "Forbidden" }, status: :forbidden
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            
              
            

                      return
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            
              
            

                    visibility = params[:visibility]
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            
              
            

                    if visibility.present?
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                      # Handle visibility parameter (for change_visibility-style calls)
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                      unless Task.visibilities.keys.include?(visibility)
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            
              
            

                        return render json: { error: "Invalid visibility setting" }, status: :bad_request
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            
              
            

                      @task.update!(visibility: visibility)
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: TaskSerializer.new(@task, current_user: current_user).as_json, status: :ok
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            
              
            

                    else
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                      # Handle coach_id/visible parameters (for toggle_visibility-style calls)
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            
              
            

                      coach_id = params[:coach_id]
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            
              
            

                      visible = params[:visible]
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            
              
            

                      coach = User.find(coach_id)
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            
              
            

                      relationship = current_user.relationship_with_coach(coach)
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                      unless relationship
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            
              
            

                        return render json: { error: "Not Found" }, status: :not_found
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                      if visible
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            
              
            

                        @task.show_to!(relationship)
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                      else
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            
              
            

                        @task.hide_from!(relationship)
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: TaskSerializer.new(@task, current_user: current_user).as_json, status: :ok
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            
              
            

                  # PATCH /api/v1/tasks/:id/change_visibility
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def change_visibility
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            
              
            

                    visibility = params[:visibility]
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                    unless %w[visible hidden coaching_only].include?(visibility)
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            
              
            

                      return render_bad_request("Invalid visibility setting")
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    case visibility
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                    when "visible"
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            
              
            

                      @task.make_visible!
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                    when "hidden"
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            
              
            

                      @task.make_hidden!
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                    when "coaching_only"
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            
              
            

                      @task.make_coaching_only!
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: TaskSerializer.new(@task, current_user: current_user).as_json
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            
              
            

                  # POST /api/v1/tasks/:id/add_subtask
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def add_subtask
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                    unless @task.list.user_id == current_user.id
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: "Forbidden" }, status: :forbidden
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            
              
            

                      return
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            
              
            

                    due_time = parse_iso(params[:due_at])
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    if Task.validators_on(:due_at).any? { |v| v.kind == :presence } && due_time.nil?
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            
              
            

                      return render json: { errors: { due_at: [ "is invalid or missing" ] } }, status: :unprocessable_content
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            
              
            

                    sub_attrs = {
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            
              
            

                      title:        params.require(:title),
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            
              
            

                      note:         params[:note],
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            
              
            

                      due_at:       due_time,
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            
              
            

                      list_id:      @task.list_id,
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            
              
            

                      creator_id:   current_user.id,
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            
              
            

                      strict_mode:  true
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            
              
            

                    }
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            
              
            

                    # prefer parent_task_id, fall back to parent_task association if you use that
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    if Task.column_names.include?("parent_task_id")
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            
              
            

                      sub_attrs[:parent_task_id] = @task.id
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            

            
              
            

                    sub = Task.new(sub_attrs)
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                    if sub.save
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: TaskSerializer.new(sub, current_user: current_user).as_json.merge(parent_task_id: @task.id), status: :created
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    else
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { errors: sub.errors.to_hash }, status: :unprocessable_content
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            

            
              
            

                  # PATCH /api/v1/tasks/:id/subtasks/:subtask_id
          
      300.

              1
            

            
              
            

                  def update_subtask
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                    unless @task.list.user_id == current_user.id
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: "Forbidden" }, status: :forbidden
          
      303.

                      return
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      305.

                  then: 0
                
              
            

                    if @task.update(task_params)
          
      307.

      308.

      311.

                  def delete_subtask
          
      315. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    315. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                    unless @task.list.user_id == current_user.id

      318.

      319.

                    @task.destroy
          
      321. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    321. 
            

            
              
            

                    head :no_content
          
      322. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    322. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      323.

                  # GET /api/v1/tasks/blocking
          
      325. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    325. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def blocking
          
      326. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    326. 
            

            
              
            

                    @tasks = current_user.owned_lists
          
      327. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    327. 
            

            
              
            

                                        .joins(tasks: :escalation)
          
      328. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    328. 
            

            
              
            

                                        .where(item_escalations: { blocking_app: true })
          
      329. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    329. 
            

            
              
            

                                        .where(tasks: { completed_at: nil })
          
      330. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    330. 
            

            
              
            

                                        .includes(:creator, :subtasks)
          
      331. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    331. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      332. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    332. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: @tasks.map { |task| TaskSerializer.new(task, current_user: current_user).as_json }
          
      333. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    333. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      334. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    334. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      335. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    335. 
            

            
              
            

                  # GET /api/v1/tasks/awaiting_explanation
          
      336. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    336. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def awaiting_explanation
          
      337. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    337. 
            

            
              
            

                    @tasks = Task.joins(:list)
          
      338. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    338. 
            

            
              
            

                                 .where(lists: { user_id: current_user.id })
          
      339. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    339. 
            

            
              
            

                                 .awaiting_explanation
          
      340. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    340. 
            

            
              
            

                                 .includes(:creator, :list)
          
      341. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    341. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      342. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    342. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: { tasks: @tasks.map { |task| TaskSerializer.new(task, current_user: current_user).as_json } }
          
      343. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    343. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      344. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    344. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      345. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    345. 
            

            
              
            

                  # GET /api/v1/tasks/overdue
          
      346. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    346. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def overdue
          
      347. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    347. 
            

            
              
            

                    @tasks = Task.joins(:list)
          
      348. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    348. 
            

            
              
            

                                 .where(lists: { user_id: current_user.id })
          
      349. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    349. 
            

            
              
            

                                 .overdue
          
      350. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    350. 
            

            
              
            

                                 .includes(:creator, :list, :escalation)
          
      351. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    351. 
            

            
              
            

                                 .order(due_at: :asc)
          
      352. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    352. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      353. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    353. 
            

            
              
            

                    render json: { tasks: @tasks.map { |task| TaskSerializer.new(task, current_user: current_user).as_json } }
          
      354. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    354. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      355. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    355. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      356. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    356. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  private
          
      357. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    357. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      358. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    358. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def set_list
          
      359. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    359. 
            

            
              
            

                    list_id = params[:list_id]
          
      360. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    360. 
            

            
              
            

                    list_id ||= params[:listId]
          
      361. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    361. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    list_id ||= params.dig(:task, :list_id) if params[:task].is_a?(ActionController::Parameters)
          
      362. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    362. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    list_id ||= params.dig(:task, :listId) if params[:task].is_a?(ActionController::Parameters)
          
      363. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    363. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    list_id ||= params.dig(:list, :id) if params[:list].is_a?(ActionController::Parameters)
          
      364. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    364. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      365. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    365. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Fallback: use user's first list if no list_id provided
          
      366. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    366. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                    if list_id.blank?
          
      367. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    367. 
            

            
              
            

                      @list = current_user.owned_lists.first
          
      368. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    368. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                      if @list.nil?
          
      369. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    369. 
            

            
              
            

                        raise ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound, "No list found. Please create a list first or specify a list_id."
          
      370. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    370. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      371. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    371. 
            

            
              
            

                    else
          
      372. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    372. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                      begin
          
      373. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    373. 
            

            
              
            

                        @list = List.find(list_id)
          
      374. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    374. 
            

            
              
            

                        # Check if user has access to this list
          
      375. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    375. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                        unless @list.can_view?(current_user)
          
      376. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    376. 
            

            
              
            

                          render json: { error: { message: "List not found" } }, status: :forbidden
          
      377. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    377. 
            

            
              
            

                          nil
          
      378. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    378. 
            

            
              
            

                        end
          
      379. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    379. 
            

            
              
            

                      rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound => e
          
      380. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    380. 
            

            
              
            

                        Rails.logger.warn "List not found: User #{current_user.id} tried to access list #{list_id}"
          
      381. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    381. 
            

            
              
            

                        render json: { error: { message: "List not found" } }, status: :not_found
          
      382. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    382. 
            

            
              
            

                        nil
          
      383. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    383. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      384. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    384. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      385. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    385. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      386. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    386. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      387. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    387. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def set_task
          
      388. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    388. 
            

            
              
            

                    begin
          
      389. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    389. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                      if params[:list_id]
          
      390. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    390. 
            

            
              
            

                        @task = Task.find(params[:id])
          
      391. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    391. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                      else
          
      392. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    392. 
            

            
              
            

                        @task = Task.find(params[:id])
          
      393. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    393. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      394. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    394. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
          
      395. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    395. 
            

            
              
            

                      render_not_found("Task")
          
      396. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    396. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      397. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    397. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      398. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    398. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      399. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    399. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def authorize_task_access
          
      400. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    400. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                    unless @task.list.can_view?(current_user) && @task.visible_to?(current_user)
          
      401. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    401. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "List not found" } }, status: :forbidden
          
      402. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    402. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      403. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    403. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      404. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    404. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      405. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    405. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def authorize_task_edit
          
      406. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    406. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                    unless @task.editable_by?(current_user)
          
      407. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    407. 
            

            
              
            

                      render json: { error: { message: "List not found" } }, status: :forbidden
          
      408. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    408. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      409. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    409. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      410. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    410. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      411. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    411. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  def task_params
          
      412. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    412. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Handle both nested task params and direct params (iOS app)
          
      413. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    413. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                    if params[:task].present?
          
      414. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    414. 
            

            
              
            

                      params.require(:task).permit(
          
      415. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    415. 
            

            
              
            

                        :title, :note, :due_at, :priority, :can_be_snoozed, :strict_mode,
          
      416. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    416. 
            

            
              
            

                        :notification_interval_minutes, :requires_explanation_if_missed,
          
      417. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    417. 
            

            
              
            

                        :is_recurring, :recurrence_pattern, :recurrence_interval, :recurrence_time, :recurrence_end_date,
          
      418. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    418. 
            

            
              
            

                        :location_based, :location_latitude, :location_longitude, :location_radius_meters,
          
      419. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    419. 
            

            
              
            

                        :location_name, :notify_on_arrival, :notify_on_departure,
          
      420. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    420. 
            

            
              
            

                        :list_id, :creator_id, :visibility,
          
      421. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    421. 
            

            
              
            

                        { recurrence_days: [] }
          
      422. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    422. 
            

            
              
            

                      )
          
      423. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    423. 
            

            
              
            

                    else
          
      424. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    424. 
            

            
              
            

                      # Handle direct params from iOS app - be more permissive to handle parameter pollution
          
      425. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    425.

              # Safe time period parsing

              def self.parse_time_period(period_string)
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

                case period_string.downcase.strip
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when /^(\d+)\s*minutes?$/
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

                  $1.to_i.minutes
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when /^(\d+)\s*hours?$/
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

                  $1.to_i.hours
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when /^(\d+)\s*days?$/
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

                  $1.to_i.days
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when /^(\d+)\s*weeks?$/
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

                  $1.to_i.weeks
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when /^(\d+)\s*months?$/
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                  $1.to_i.months
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when /^(\d+)\s*years?$/
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

                  $1.to_i.years
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  # Fallback to default if parsing fails
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

                  1.week
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

                end

            class NudgeJob
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

              include Sidekiq::Job
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              def perform(task_id, reason = nil)
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

                task = Task.find(task_id)
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

                list = task.list
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                members = list.memberships.includes(:user).map(&:user)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                members.each do |user|
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                  user.devices.find_each do |device|
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                    ApnsClient.new.push(
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                      device_token: device.apns_token,
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                      title: "Task updated",
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                      body:  push_body(task, reason),
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                      payload: { type: "task.nudge", task_id: task.id }
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                    )
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

              private
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      23.

              def push_body(task, reason)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                if task.done?
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                  "Completed: #{task.title}"
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                elsif reason.present?
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                  "Reassigned: #{task.title} — #{reason}"
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                  "Due soon: #{task.title}"
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

            end

              def perform(user_id:, title: "Test Push", body: "This is a test push notification", data: {})

    5. 
            

            
              
            

                user = User.find(user_id)

      9.

                # Check if user has devices

                if user.devices.empty?

    17.

      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "[TestPushNotificationJob] Test notification sent to user #{user.id}"
          
      22.

                rescue => e
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23.

              def coaching_relationship_must_be_active
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                return unless coaching_relationship

    186. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0

    187. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                  errors.add(:coaching_relationship, "must be active") unless coaching_relationship.status.to_s == "active"
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0

      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                  errors.add(:coaching_relationship, "must be active") unless coaching_relationship.active?
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190.

              def metadata_must_be_object

    194. 
            

            
              
            

                # Allow nil (factory/spec uses empty hash and nil)
          
      195.

                  else: 0
                
              
            

                return if metadata.nil?
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                unless metadata.is_a?(Hash)
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            
              
            

                  errors.add(:summary_data, "is not a valid JSON") # maintain earlier wording if specs expect it
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            
              
            

                  errors.add(:metadata, "must be a JSON object")
          
      199.

                end
          
      200.
