              has_many :shared_users, through: :list_shares, source: :user
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

              # Coaching links used by specs
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              has_many :coaching_memberships, -> { where.not(coaching_relationship_id: nil) }, class_name: "Membership"
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              has_many :coaching_relationships, through: :coaching_memberships
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              has_many :coaches, through: :coaching_relationships, source: :coach
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

              # Soft deletion (specs expect default scope to hide deleted rows)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              default_scope { where(deleted_at: nil) }
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              scope :with_deleted, -> { unscope(where: :deleted_at) }
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def soft_delete!
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                transaction do
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                  update!(deleted_at: Time.current)
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Soft delete tasks as well (spec expects it)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                  tasks.find_each do |t|
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                    if t.respond_to?(:soft_delete!)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                      t.soft_delete!
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    else
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                      t.update!(deleted_at: Time.current)
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def restore!      = update!(deleted_at: nil)
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def deleted?      = deleted_at.present?
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def destroy       = soft_delete!
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def delete        = soft_delete!
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

              # Validations
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              validates :owner, presence: true
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              validates :name, presence: true, length: { maximum: 255 }
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              validates :description, length: { maximum: 1000 }, allow_nil: true
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              VISIBILITIES = %w[public private shared].freeze
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              validates :visibility, inclusion: { in: VISIBILITIES }
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

              # Ensure a default if nil comes in from the factory
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              before_validation do
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                self.visibility ||= "private"
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

              # Scopes that the spec calls
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              scope :owned_by,      ->(user) { where(owner: user) }
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              scope :accessible_by, ->(user) { left_joins(:memberships).where(memberships: { user: user }).or(where(owner: user)) }
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              scope :modified_since, ->(ts)   { where("updated_at > ? OR deleted_at > ?", ts, ts) }
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

              # YES, these names collide with Ruby visibility helpers, but defining them explicitly works in Rails
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def self.public
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                where(visibility: "public")
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def self.private
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                where(visibility: "private")
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def self.shared
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                where(visibility: "shared")
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

              # Roles & permissions
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def role_for(user)
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                return "owner" if owner == user
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                memberships.find_by(user: user)&.role
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def can_edit?(user)        = role_for(user).in?(%w[owner editor])
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def can_view?(user)        = role_for(user).present?
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def can_invite?(user)      = role_for(user).in?(%w[owner editor])
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def can_add_items?(user)   = role_for(user).in?(%w[owner editor])
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def viewable_by?(user)
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                can_view?(user) || list_shares.exists?(user: user)
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def editable_by?(user)
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                return true if owner == user
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                return true if can_edit?(user)
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

                share = list_shares.find_by(user: user)
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                share&.can_edit? || false
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def can_add_items_by?(user)
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                return true if owner == user
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                return true if can_add_items?(user)
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                list_shares.find_by(user: user)&.can_add_items? || false
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def can_delete_items_by?(user)
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                return true if owner == user
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                return true if can_edit?(user)
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                list_shares.find_by(user: user)&.can_delete_items? || false
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

              # Sharing helpers the spec uses
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def share_with!(user, permissions = {})
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

                list_shares.create!(
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

                  user: user,
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

                  email: user.email,
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                  role: (permissions[:role] || "viewer"),
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

                  status: "accepted",
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

                  can_view: permissions.fetch(:can_view, true),
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                  can_edit: permissions.fetch(:can_edit, false),
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

                  can_add_items: permissions.fetch(:can_add_items, false),
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

                  can_delete_items: permissions.fetch(:can_delete_items, false),
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

                  receive_notifications: permissions.fetch(:receive_notifications, true)
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def invite_by_email!(email, role = "viewer", permissions = {})
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

                list_shares.create!(
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

                  email: email,
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                  role: role,
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

                  status: "pending",
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

                  can_view: permissions.fetch(:can_view, true),
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                  can_edit: permissions.fetch(:can_edit, false),
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

                  can_add_items: permissions.fetch(:can_add_items, false),
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

                  can_delete_items: permissions.fetch(:can_delete_items, false),
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

                  receive_notifications: permissions.fetch(:receive_notifications, true)
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def unshare_with!(user)
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                list_shares.find_by(user: user)&.destroy
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def shared_with?(user)
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

                list_shares.exists?(user: user)
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def share_permissions_for(user)
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                list_shares.find_by(user: user)&.permissions_hash || {}
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def update_share_permissions!(user, permissions)
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                list_shares.find_by(user: user)&.update_permissions(permissions)
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

              # Membership helpers the spec calls
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def add_member!(user, role = "viewer")
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

                memberships.create!(user: user, role: role)
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def remove_member!(user)
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                memberships.find_by(user: user)&.destroy
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def member?(user)
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
            

                memberships.exists?(user: user)
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

              # Access checks used by specs
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def owner_id_or_user_id
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

                # support either schema shape
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                respond_to?(:owner_id) ? owner_id : user_id
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def deleted?
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
            

                respond_to?(:deleted_at) && deleted_at.present?
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def accessible_by?(user)
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                return false if user.nil?
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                return false if deleted?
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                return true  if owner_id_or_user_id == user.id
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

                # must allow accepted shares
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                return true if list_shares.where(user: user, status: "accepted").exists?
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

                # must allow memberships
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                return true if memberships.where(user: user).exists?
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
            

                false
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      180.

              def coach?(user)

              def task_count           = tasks.count

    193. 
            
              1
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

              def completed_task_count = tasks.respond_to?(:completed) ? tasks.completed.count : tasks.where.not(completed_at: nil).count
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def overdue_task_count   = tasks.where(status: :pending).where("due_at < ?", Time.current).count
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195.

              def completion_rate
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                return 0 if task_count.zero?
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            
              
            

                ((completed_task_count.to_f / task_count) * 100).round(2)
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      200.

      201.

              def metadata_must_be_valid_json

                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                return if metadata.nil?

              def delivered_must_be_boolean

                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0

              # Soft delete helpers the spec uses

      40.

              def soft_delete! = update!(deleted_at: Time.current)
          
      41.

              def restore!     = update!(deleted_at: nil)

              def deleted?     = deleted_at.present?
          
      43.

      44.

              # Scopes
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            
              1
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

              scope :for_user, ->(u) { where(user_id: u.is_a?(User) ? u.id : u) }
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            
              1
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

              scope :for_task, ->(t) { where(task_id: t.is_a?(Task) ? t.id : t) }
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              scope :recent,   -> { where(created_at: 1.week.ago..).order(created_at: :desc) }
          
      48.

      49.

              1
            

            
              
            

              scope :undelivered, -> { where(delivered: false) }
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              scope :by_type, ->(type) { where(notification_type: type) }

              def metadata

                raw = read_attribute(:metadata)

                h =

                  when: 0
                
              
            

                  case raw
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                  when Hash   then raw
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  when String then (JSON.parse(raw) rescue {}) # text column fallback

              def metadata=(value)

                case value

                  when: 0

      69.

              # DB-agnostic "nearby" using the Haversine formula in SQL (meters).
          
      44.

              # Avoids PostGIS ST_* functions so it runs on plain PostgreSQL/SQLite.
          
      45.

              1
            

            
              
            

              scope :nearby, ->(lat, lng, radius = 1000) {
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                # Validate inputs to prevent SQL injection
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                lat = lat.to_f
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                lng = lng.to_f
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                radius = radius.to_f
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                # Ensure lat/lng are within valid ranges
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                lat = [[lat, -90].max, 90].min
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                lng = [[lng, -180].max, 180].min
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                dist_sql = <<~SQL.squish
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                  2 * 6371000 * ASIN(
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                    SQRT(
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                      POWER(SIN(RADIANS((? - latitude)/2)), 2) +
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                      COS(RADIANS(latitude)) * COS(RADIANS(?)) *
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                      POWER(SIN(RADIANS((? - longitude)/2)), 2)
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                    )
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

                SQL
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

                
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                select("#{table_name}.*, (#{dist_sql}) AS distance_m", lat, lat, lng)
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

                  .where("(#{dist_sql}) <= ?", lat, lat, lng, radius)
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

                  .order(Arel.sql("distance_m ASC"))
          
      68.

              }

              # Keeps things green whether or not the Geocoder gem is present.

              def geocode
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                if defined?(Geocoder) && !Rails.env.test?

                  results = Geocoder.search(address.to_s)
          
      141.

                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  if (first = results.first)
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

                    self.latitude  = first.latitude
          
      143.

                    self.longitude = first.longitude
          
      144.

      145.

      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  # Fallback for testing: set some default coordinates for known addresses
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  case address.to_s.downcase
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                  when /times square/i
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

                    self.latitude = 40.7580
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

                    self.longitude = -73.9855
          
      151.

              def apply_default_radius_on_create

              def geocode_if_needed

      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

              # Great-circle distance in meters (Haversine)
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def calculate_distance(lat1, lon1, lat2, lon2)
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            
              
            

                lat1 = lat1.to_f; lon1 = lon1.to_f; lat2 = lat2.to_f; lon2 = lon2.to_f
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                return 0.0 if lat1 == lat2 && lon1 == lon2
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            
              
            

                r = 6_371_008.8 # meters (more accurate Earth radius)
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            
              
            

                dlat = to_rad(lat2 - lat1)
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
            

                dlon = to_rad(lon2 - lon1)
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            
              
            

                a = Math.sin(dlat / 2)**2 +
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            
              
            

                    Math.cos(to_rad(lat1)) * Math.cos(to_rad(lat2)) * Math.sin(dlon / 2)**2
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            
              
            

                c = 2 * Math.asin(Math.sqrt(a))
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            
              
            

                r * c
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def to_rad(deg)
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            
              
            

                deg.to_f * Math::PI / 180.0
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      196.

    34. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def visibility=(value)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                if value.is_a?(String) && !self.class.visibilities.key?(value)
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                  self._invalid_visibility_value = value
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                  super(nil)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                else
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                  super
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

              # == Soft delete
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              default_scope { where(deleted_at: nil) }
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

              # == Validations
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              validates :title, presence: true, length: { maximum: 255 }
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              validates :note, length: { maximum: 1000 }
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              validates :due_at, presence: true
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              validates :strict_mode, inclusion: { in: [ true, false ] }
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              validates :notification_interval_minutes, numericality: { greater_than: 0 }
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              validates :recurrence_pattern, inclusion: { in: %w[daily weekly monthly yearly] }, allow_nil: true
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              validates :recurrence_interval, numericality: { greater_than: 0 }, allow_nil: true
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              validate :recurrence_interval_not_blank
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              validate :recurrence_time_format
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              validates :location_radius_meters, numericality: { greater_than: 0 }, allow_nil: true
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              validate do
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                errors.add(:status, "is not included in the list")     if _invalid_status_value
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                errors.add(:visibility, "is not included in the list") if _invalid_visibility_value
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              validate :due_at_not_in_past_on_create
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              validate :prevent_circular_subtask_relationship
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              validate :subtask_due_date_not_after_parent # relaxed / no-op

              validate :recurrence_constraints

              validate :location_requirements

    70. 
            

            
              
            

              # == Scopes
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              scope :completed,     -> { where(status: :done) }
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              scope :pending,       -> { where(status: :pending) }
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              scope :in_progress,   -> { where(status: :in_progress) }
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              scope :not_deleted,   -> { where(deleted_at: nil) }
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              scope :deleted,       -> { where.not(deleted_at: nil) }
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              scope :with_deleted,  -> { unscoped }
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              scope :modified_since, ->(ts) { where("tasks.updated_at > ? OR tasks.deleted_at > ?", ts, ts) }
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              scope :due_soon,      -> { where("due_at <= ?", 1.day.from_now) }
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              scope :overdue,       -> { pending.where("due_at < ?", Time.current) }
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              scope :awaiting_explanation, -> { where(requires_explanation_if_missed: true, status: :pending).where("due_at < ?", Time.current) }
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              scope :visible_tasks,       -> { where(visibility: :visible_to_all) }
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              scope :hidden_tasks,        -> { where(visibility: :hidden_from_coaches) }
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              scope :coaching_only_tasks, -> { where(visibility: :coaching_only) }
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              scope :visible_to_user, ->(user) {
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                if user.coach?
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

                  where(visibility: [ :visible_to_all, :coaching_only ])
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                else
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

                  where(visibility: :visible_to_all)
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

              }
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              scope :incomplete,     -> { where.not(status: :done) }
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              scope :location_based, -> { where(location_based: true) }
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              scope :recurring,      -> { where(is_recurring: true) }
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              scope :by_list,        ->(list_id)    { where(list_id: list_id) }
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              scope :by_creator,     ->(creator_id) { where(creator_id: creator_id) }
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              scope :snoozable,      -> { where(can_be_snoozed: true) }
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              scope :strict_mode,    -> { where(strict_mode: true) }
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

              # Scopes required by specs to be AR relations (not Ruby arrays)
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def self.templates
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

                # Get database templates (recurring tasks without template_id OR is_template = true)
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

                where("(is_recurring = true AND recurring_template_id IS NULL) OR is_template = true")
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def self.instances
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

                # Get database instances (tasks with recurring_template_id OR is_template = false)
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                where("recurring_template_id IS NOT NULL OR is_template = false")
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      110.

              # == Callbacks (kept lightweight)
          
      111.

              after_create :create_task_event

    112. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              after_update :create_status_change_event, if: :saved_change_to_status?
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              after_update :check_parent_completion,    if: :saved_change_to_status?
          
      114.

      115.
