              end
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

              private
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

              def derive_priority
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

                return 3 if task.strict_mode && overdue?  # Urgent
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

                return 2 if task.strict_mode               # High
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

                return 1 if task.due_at && task.due_at < 24.hours.from_now  # Medium
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

                0  # Low
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

              def overdue?
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

                # Task is overdue if it has a due date in the past and is NOT completed
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

                task.due_at.present? &&
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

                task.due_at < Time.current &&
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

                (task.status.nil? || task.status == "pending" || task.status == "in_progress")
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

              def minutes_overdue
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

                return 0 unless overdue?
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

                ((Time.current - task.due_at) / 60).to_i
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

              def requires_explanation?
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

                task.requires_explanation_if_missed && overdue? && task.missed_reason.nil?
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

              def creator_data
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                creator = task.creator || task.list.owner
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

                return {} unless creator
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                {
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

                  id: creator.id,
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

                  email: creator.email,
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

                  name: creator.name,
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

                  role: creator.role
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

                }
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

              def created_by_coach?
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

                task.creator_id.present? && task.creator_id != task.list.user_id
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

              def can_edit?
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                return true if task.creator_id == current_user.id
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

                return true if task.list.user_id == current_user.id
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

                false
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

              def can_delete?
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

                return true if task.creator_id == current_user.id
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

                return true if task.list.user_id == current_user.id
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

                false
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

              def can_complete?
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

                task.list.user_id == current_user.id
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

              def can_change_visibility?
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

                return false unless current_user
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

                # Only creator, list owner, or coaches can change visibility
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

                task.creator == current_user || task.list.owner == current_user || (current_user.coach? && task.list.coach?(current_user))
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

              def escalation_data
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

                return nil unless task.escalation
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

                {
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

                  level: task.escalation.escalation_level,
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

                  notification_count: task.escalation.notification_count,
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

                  blocking_app: task.escalation.blocking_app,
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

                  coaches_notified: task.escalation.coaches_notified,
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

                  became_overdue_at: task.escalation.became_overdue_at&.iso8601,
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

                  last_notification_at: task.escalation.last_notification_at&.iso8601
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

                }
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

              def has_subtasks?
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

                task.subtasks.any?
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

              def subtasks_count
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

                task.subtasks.count
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

              def subtasks_completed_count
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
            

                task.subtasks.where(status: "done").count
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
            

              def subtask_percentage
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

                return 0 if subtasks_count.zero?
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

                (subtasks_completed_count.to_f / subtasks_count * 100).round
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

              def completed_at_value
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

                # Use the actual completed_at field if it exists, otherwise fall back to updated_at
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            
              
            

                if task.status == "done"
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
            

                  task.completed_at&.iso8601 || task.updated_at.iso8601
          
      178.

                def jwt!
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                  now = Time.now.to_i

                  synchronize do
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

                    if @jwt.nil? || (now - @jwt_iat) >= TOKEN_TTL_SECONDS
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

                      headers = { kid: @key_id, alg: "ES256", typ: "JWT" }
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

                      claims  = { iss: @team_id, iat: now } # APNs only wants iss + iat

    115. 
            

            
              
            

                      @jwt    = JWT.encode(claims, @p8_key, "ES256", headers)

              def push(device_token:, title:, body:, payload: {})
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                notification = Apnotic::Notification.new(device_token)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                notification.topic = APNS_P8[:bundle_id]
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                notification.alert = { title: title, body: body }
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                notification.sound = "default"
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                notification.custom_payload = payload
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                @connection.push(notification).tap { @connection.close }
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

            end

              def task_changed(task, event:, current_user: nil)

    5. 
            

            
              
            

                # Use TaskSerializer for consistent JSON structure
          
      6.

                # If no current_user provided, create a minimal payload

                if current_user

    9. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Create a basic payload without user-specific fields
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                  task_payload = {
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12.

      13.

                @rel.update!(status: :pending)

                @rel

              def authorize!(action)

    43. 
            

            
              
            

                policy = CoachingRelationshipPolicy.new(@actor, @rel)

                raise Pundit::NotAuthorizedError unless policy.public_send(action)

              def enqueue_notification(event)

    48. 
            

            
              
            

                # For now, we'll use a simple notification service

                # In a real app, you'd enqueue a job like: RelationshipEventJob.perform_later(@rel.id, event)

                Rails.logger.info "Coaching relationship event: #{event} for relationship #{@rel.id}"
          
      51.

              end

            end

                def task_completed(task)

                  task.list.coaches.each do |coach|

                  end
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

                # When task becomes overdue
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

                def task_missed(task)
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

                  task.list.coaches.each do |coach|
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

                    relationship = task.list.owner.relationship_with_coach(coach)
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

                    next unless relationship&.notify_on_missed_deadline?
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

                    next unless task.visible_to?(coach)
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

                    send_apns_notification(
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

                      user: coach,
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

                      title: "⚠️ Task Missed",
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

                      body: "#{task.list.owner.name} missed: #{task.title}",
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

                      data: {
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                        type: "task_missed",
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

                        task_id: task.id,
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

                        client_id: task.list.owner.id,
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

                        minutes_overdue: task.minutes_overdue
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

                      },
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

                      sound: "default",
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

                      category: "TASK_MISSED"
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

                    )
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

                    log_notification(
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

                      task: task,
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

                      user: coach,
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

                      type: "task_missed",
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

                      message: "Task missed deadline"
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

                    )
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

                # When task requires explanation from client
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

                def task_missed_needs_explanation(task)
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

                  client = task.list.owner
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

                  send_apns_notification(
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

                    user: client,
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

                    title: "❗️ Explanation Required",
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

                    body: "You missed '#{task.title}'. Please provide an explanation.",
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

                    data: {
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                      type: "explanation_required",
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

                      task_id: task.id,
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

                      list_id: task.list_id
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                    },
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

                    badge: calculate_badge_count(client),
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

                    sound: "default",
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

                    category: "EXPLANATION_REQUIRED",
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

                    interruption_level: "time-sensitive"
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

                  log_notification(
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

                    task: task,
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

                    user: client,
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                    type: "explanation_required",
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

                    message: "Explanation required for missed task"
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

                  task_missed(task)
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

                # When client submits explanation
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

                def explanation_submitted(task)
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

                  task.list.coaches.each do |coach|
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

                    next unless task.visible_to?(coach)
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

                    send_apns_notification(
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

                      user: coach,
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

                      title: "📝 Explanation Submitted",
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

                      body: "#{task.list.owner.name} explained missing: #{task.title}",
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

                      data: {
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

                        type: "explanation_submitted",
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

                        task_id: task.id,
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

                        client_id: task.list.owner.id,
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

                        explanation: task.missed_reason
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

                      },
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

                      category: "EXPLANATION_SUBMITTED"
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
            

                    )
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

                    log_notification(
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

                      task: task,
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

                      user: coach,
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

                      type: "explanation_submitted",
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

                      message: "Client submitted explanation"
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

                    )
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

                # ==========================================
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

                # ESCALATION & REMINDER NOTIFICATIONS
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
            

                # ==========================================
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

                # Regular reminder for overdue task
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

                def send_reminder(task, escalation_level)
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

                  client = task.list.owner
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

                  emoji = case escalation_level
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

                  when "normal" then "⏰"
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

                  when "warning" then "⚠️"
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

                  when "critical" then "🚨"
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
            

                  when "blocking" then "🛑"
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

                  else "⏰"
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Use critical interruption for blocking
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

                  interruption_level = case escalation_level
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

                  when "blocking" then "critical"
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

                  when "critical" then "time-sensitive"
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

                  else "active"
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
            

                  sound = escalation_level == "blocking" ? "critical.caf" : "default"
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            
              
            

                  send_apns_notification(
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            
              
            

                    user: client,
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            
              
            

                    title: "#{emoji} Task Reminder",
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            
              
            

                    body: task.title,
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            
              
            

                    data: {
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            
              
            

                      type: "reminder",
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
            

                      task_id: task.id,
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            
              
            

                      escalation_level: escalation_level,
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            
              
            

                      minutes_overdue: task.minutes_overdue,
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            
              
            

                      notification_count: task.escalation.notification_count
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            
              
            

                    },
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            
              
            

                    badge: calculate_badge_count(client),
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            
              
            

                    sound: sound,
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            
              
            

                    critical: escalation_level == "blocking",
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            
              
            

                    interruption_level: interruption_level,
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            
              
            

                    category: "TASK_REMINDER"
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            
              
            

                  log_notification(
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            
              
            

                    task: task,
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            
              
            

                    user: client,
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            
              
            

                    type: "reminder",
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            
              
            

                    message: "Reminder sent (#{escalation_level})",
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            
              
            

                    metadata: {
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            
              
            

                      escalation_level: escalation_level,
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            
              
            

                      notification_count: task.escalation.notification_count
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            
              
            

                    }
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            
              
            

                # When app gets blocked due to critical overdue task
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            
              
            

                def app_blocking_started(task)
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            
              
            

                  client = task.list.owner
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            
              
            

                  send_apns_notification(
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            
              
            

                    user: client,
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            
              
            

                    title: "🛑 Critical Task Overdue",
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            
              
            

                    body: "Complete '#{task.title}' to continue using the app",
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            
              
            

                    data: {
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            
              
            

                      type: "app_blocking",
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            
              
            

                      task_id: task.id,
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            
              
            

                      blocking: true
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            
              
            

                    },
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            
              
            

                    badge: calculate_badge_count(client),
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            
              
            

                    sound: "critical.caf",
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            
              
            

                    critical: true,
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            
              
            

                    interruption_level: "critical",
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            
              
            

                    category: "APP_BLOCKING"
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            
              
            

                  log_notification(
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            
              
            

                    task: task,
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            
              
            

                    user: client,
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            
              
            

                    type: "app_blocking",
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            
              
            

                    message: "App blocking started for critical task"
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            
              
            

                # Alert coaches that client has critical overdue task
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            
              
            

                def alert_coaches_of_overdue(task)
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            
              
            

                  task.list.coaches.each do |coach|
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            
              
            

                    relationship = task.list.owner.relationship_with_coach(coach)
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            
              
            

                    next unless relationship&.notify_on_missed_deadline?
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            
              
            

                    next unless task.visible_to?(coach)
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            
              
            

                    send_apns_notification(
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            
              
            

                      user: coach,
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            
              
            

                      title: "🚨 Client Task Critical",
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            
              
            

                      body: "#{task.list.owner.name}'s task '#{task.title}' is #{task.minutes_overdue} min overdue",
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            
              
            

                      data: {
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            
              
            

                        type: "coach_alert_critical",
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            
              
            

                        task_id: task.id,
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            
              
            

                        client_id: task.list.owner.id,
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            
              
            

                        minutes_overdue: task.minutes_overdue,
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            
              
            

                        escalation_level: task.escalation.escalation_level
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            
              
            

                      },
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            
              
            

                      sound: "default",
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            
              
            

                      category: "COACH_ALERT_CRITICAL"
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            
              
            

                    )
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            
              
            

                    log_notification(
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            
              
            

                      task: task,
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            
              
            

                      user: coach,
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            
              
            

                      type: "coach_alert_critical",
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            
              
            

                      message: "Critical overdue alert sent to coach"
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            
              
            

                    )
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            
              
            

                end

                def location_based_reminder(task, event)
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            
              
            

                  client = task.list.owner
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            
              
            

                  message = case event
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            
              
            

                  when :arrival
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            
              
            

                              "You're at #{task.location_name}! Don't forget: #{task.title}"
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            
              
            

                  when :departure
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            
              
            

                              "Leaving #{task.location_name}. Did you complete: #{task.title}?"
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            
              
            

                  else
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            
              
            

                              task.title
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            
              
            

                  send_push_notification(
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            
              
            

                    user: client,
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            

            
              
            

                    title: "📍 Location Reminder",
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            
              
            

                    body: message,
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            

            
              
            

                    data: {
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            

            
              
            

                      type: "location_reminder",
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            

            
              
            

                      task_id: task.id,
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            

            
              
            

                      event: event.to_s,
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            

            
              
            

                      location_name: task.location_name
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            

            
              
            

                    },
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            

            
              
            

                    priority: "high"
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            

            
              
            

                  )

    296.

      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            

            
              
            

                    task: task,
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            

            
              
            

                    user: client,
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300.

      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301.

      302.

                    metadata: {

                def recurring_task_generated(task)
          
      314. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    314. 
            

            
              
            

                  client = task.list.owner
          
      315. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    315. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      316. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    316. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Only notify if due soon (within 24 hours)
          
      317. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    317. 
            

            
              
            

                  return unless task.due_at.present? && task.due_at < 24.hours.from_now
          
      318. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    318. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      319. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    319. 
            

            
              
            

                  send_push_notification(
          
      320.

      322. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    322. 
            

            
              
            

                    body: task.title,
          
      323. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    323. 
            

            
              
            

                    data: {
          
      324. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    324.

      325.

                      task_id: task.id,
          
      326. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    326. 
            

            
              
            

                      due_at: task.due_at.iso8601
          
      327. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    327. 
            

            
              
            

                    }
          
      328. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    328. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      329. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    329. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      330.

      331.

      332.

                    user: client,
          
      333.

      343.

                  recipient = if relationship.invited_by == "coach"
          
      344.

      350.

                             relationship.coach

                    data: {
          
      362.

                # DAILY SUMMARY

                def send_daily_summary(summary)
          
      464. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    464. 
            

            
              
            

                  coach = summary.coaching_relationship.coach
          
      465. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    465. 
            

            
              
            

                  client = summary.coaching_relationship.client
          
      466. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    466. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      467. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    467. 
            

            
              
            

                  message = build_summary_message(summary)
          
      468. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    468. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      469. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    469. 
            

            
              
            

                  send_push_notification(
          
      470. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    470. 
            

            
              
            

                    user: coach,
          
      471. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    471. 
            

            
              
            

                    title: "📊 Daily Summary - #{client.name || client.email}",
          
      472. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    472. 
            

            
              
            

                    body: message,
          
      473. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    473. 
            

            
              
            

                    data: {
          
      474. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    474. 
            

            
              
            

                      type: "daily_summary",
          
      475. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    475. 
            

            
              
            

                      summary_id: summary.id,
          
      476. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    476. 
            

            
              
            

                      client_id: client.id,
          
      477. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    477. 
            

            
              
            

                      summary_date: summary.summary_date.iso8601,
          
      478. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    478. 
            

            
              
            

                      stats: {
          
      479. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    479. 
            

            
              
            

                        completed: summary.tasks_completed,
          
      480. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    480. 
            

            
              
            

                        missed: summary.tasks_missed,
          
      481. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    481. 
            

            
              
            

                        overdue: summary.tasks_overdue,
          
      482. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    482. 
            

            
              
            

                        completion_rate: summary.completion_rate
          
      483. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    483. 
            

            
              
            

                      }
          
      484. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    484. 
            

            
              
            

                    }
          
      485. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    485. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      486. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    486. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      487. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    487. 
            

            
              
            

                  log_notification(
          
      488. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    488. 
            

            
              
            

                    task: nil,
          
      489. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    489. 
            

            
              
            

                    user: coach,
          
      490. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    490. 
            

            
              
            

                    type: "daily_summary",
          
      491. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    491. 
            

            
              
            

                    message: "Daily summary sent to coach"
          
      492. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    492. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      493. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    493. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      494. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    494. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      495. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    495. 
            

            
              
            

                # ==========================================
          
      496.

                def send_test_notification(user, message = "Test notification")
          
      500. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    500. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Send to iOS devices
          
      501. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    501. 
            

            
              
            

                  if user.devices.ios.any? && APNS_CLIENT.present?
          
      502. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    502. 
            

            
              
            

                    send_apns_notification(
          
      503. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    503. 
            

            
              
            

                      user: user,
          
      504. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    504. 
            

            
              
            

                      title: "🧪 Test Notification",
          
      505. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    505. 
            

            
              
            

                      body: message,
          
      506. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    506. 
            

            
              
            

                      data: {
          
      507. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    507. 
            

            
              
            

                        type: "test",
          
      508. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    508. 
            

            
              
            

                        timestamp: Time.current.iso8601
          
      509. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    509. 
            

            
              
            

                      }
          
      510. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    510. 
            

            
              
            

                    )
          
      511. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    511. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      512. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    512. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      513. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    513. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Send to Android devices
          
      514. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    514. 
            

            
              
            

                  if user.devices.android.any? && defined?(FCM) && FCM.present?
          
      515. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    515. 
            

            
              
            

                    send_fcm_notification(
          
      516. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    516. 
            

            
              
            

                      user: user,
          
      517. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    517. 
            

            
              
            

                      title: "🧪 Test Notification",
          
      518. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    518. 
            

            
              
            

                      body: message,
          
      519. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    519. 
            

            
              
            

                      data: {
          
      520. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    520. 
            

            
              
            

                        type: "test",
          
      521. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    521. 
            

            
              
            

                        timestamp: Time.current.iso8601
          
      522. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    522. 
            

            
              
            

                      }

    523. 
            

            
              
            

                    )
          
      524. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    524. 
            

            
              
            

                  end

    525. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      526. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    526. 
            

            
              
            

                  log_notification(
          
      527. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    527. 
            

            
              
            

                    task: nil,

                    message: "Test notification sent"
          
      531. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    531. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
