                # ==========================================
          
      535. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    535. 
            

            
              
            

                # PRIVATE HELPER METHODS
          
      536. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    536. 
            

            
              
            

                # ==========================================
          
      537. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    537. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      538. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    538. 
            

            
              
            

                private
          
      539. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    539. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      540. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    540. 
            

            
              
            

                def send_apns_notification(user:, title:, body:, data: {}, badge: nil, sound: "default", critical: false, interruption_level: "active", category: nil)
          
      541. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    541. 
            

            
              
            

                  return unless user.devices.ios.any?
          
      542. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    542. 
            

            
              
            

                  return unless APNS_CLIENT.present?
          
      543. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    543. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      544. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    544. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Build notification payload
          
      545. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    545. 
            

            
              
            

                  aps_payload = {
          
      546. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    546. 
            

            
              
            

                    alert: {
          
      547. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    547. 
            

            
              
            

                      title: title,
          
      548. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    548. 
            

            
              
            

                      body: body
          
      549. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    549. 
            

            
              
            

                    },
          
      550. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    550. 
            

            
              
            

                    sound: sound,
          
      551. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    551. 
            

            
              
            

                    badge: badge || calculate_badge_count(user)
          
      552. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    552. 
            

            
              
            

                  }
          
      553. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    553. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      554. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    554. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Add critical alert capability for iOS
          
      555. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    555. 
            

            
              
            

                  if critical
          
      556. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    556. 
            

            
              
            

                    aps_payload[:sound] = {
          
      557. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    557. 
            

            
              
            

                      critical: 1,
          
      558. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    558. 
            

            
              
            

                      name: "critical.caf",
          
      559. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    559. 
            

            
              
            

                      volume: 1.0
          
      560. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    560. 
            

            
              
            

                    }
          
      561. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    561. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      562. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    562. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      563. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    563. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Add interruption level for iOS 15+
          
      564. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    564. 
            

            
              
            

                  if interruption_level != "active"
          
      565. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    565. 
            

            
              
            

                    aps_payload[:'interruption-level'] = interruption_level
          
      566. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    566. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      567. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    567. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      568. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    568. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Add category for notification actions
          
      569. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    569. 
            

            
              
            

                  if category
          
      570. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    570. 
            

            
              
            

                    aps_payload[:category] = category
          
      571. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    571. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      572. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    572. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      573. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    573. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Build complete payload
          
      574. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    574. 
            

            
              
            

                  payload = {
          
      575. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    575. 
            

            
              
            

                    aps: aps_payload,
          
      576. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    576. 
            

            
              
            

                    data: data.merge(
          
      577. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    577. 
            

            
              
            

                      title: title,
          
      578. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    578. 
            

            
              
            

                      body: body,
          
      579. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    579. 
            

            
              
            

                      timestamp: Time.current.to_i
          
      580. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    580. 
            

            
              
            

                    ).compact
          
      581. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    581. 
            

            
              
            

                  }
          
      582. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    582. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      583. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    583. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Send to all iOS devices
          
      584. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    584. 
            

            
              
            

                  user.devices.ios.each do |device|
          
      585. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    585. 
            

            
              
            

                    begin
          
      586. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    586. 
            

            
              
            

                      # Use our custom APNs client
          
      587. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    587. 
            

            
              
            

                      response = APNS_CLIENT.send_notification(
          
      588. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    588. 
            

            
              
            

                        device.apns_token,
          
      589. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    589. 
            

            
              
            

                        payload,
          
      590. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    590. 
            

            
              
            

                        push_type: "alert",
          
      591. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    591. 
            

            
              
            

                        priority: critical ? 10 : 5,
          
      592. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    592. 
            

            
              
            

                        expiration: Time.now.to_i + 1.hour.to_i
          
      593. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    593. 
            

            
              
            

                      )
          
      594. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    594. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      595. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    595. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.info "[NotificationService] APNs sent to user ##{user.id}: #{title}"
          
      596. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    596. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.debug "[NotificationService] APNs Response: #{response.inspect}"
          
      597. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    597. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      598. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    598. 
            

            
              
            

                      # Check for errors
          
      599. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    599. 
            

            
              
            

                      if response[:status] == 410 # Unregistered
          
      600. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    600. 
            

            
              
            

                        Rails.logger.warn "[NotificationService] Unregistered APNs token for user ##{user.id}, removing device..."
          
      601. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    601. 
            

            
              
            

                        device.destroy
          
      602. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    602. 
            

            
              
            

                      elsif !response[:ok]
          
      603. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    603. 
            

            
              
            

                        Rails.logger.error "[NotificationService] APNs error for user ##{user.id}: #{response[:status]} - #{response[:reason]}"
          
      604. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    604. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      605. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    605. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      606. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    606. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue => e
          
      607. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    607. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.error "[NotificationService] APNs error sending to user ##{user.id}: #{e.message}"
          
      608. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    608. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.join("\n")
          
      609. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    609. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      610. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    610. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      611. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    611. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      612. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    612. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      613. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    613. 
            

            
              
            

                def send_fcm_notification(user:, title:, body:, data: {}, priority: "normal", critical: false, sound: "default", action: nil)
          
      614. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    614. 
            

            
              
            

                  return unless user.fcm_token.present?
          
      615. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    615. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      616. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    616. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Build notification payload
          
      617. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    617. 
            

            
              
            

                  notification_payload = {
          
      618. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    618. 
            

            
              
            

                    title: title,
          
      619. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    619. 
            

            
              
            

                    body: body,
          
      620. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    620. 
            

            
              
            

                    sound: sound
          
      621. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    621. 
            

            
              
            

                  }
          
      622. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    622. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      623. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    623. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Add critical alert capability for iOS
          
      624. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    624. 
            

            
              
            

                  if critical
          
      625. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    625. 
            

            
              
            

                    notification_payload[:sound] = {
          
      626. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    626. 
            

            
              
            

                      critical: 1,
          
      627. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    627. 
            

            
              
            

                      name: "critical.caf",
          
      628. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    628. 
            

            
              
            

                      volume: 1.0
          
      629. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    629. 
            

            
              
            

                    }
          
      630. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    630. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      631. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    631. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      632. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    632. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Build complete payload
          
      633. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    633. 
            

            
              
            

                  payload = {
          
      634. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    634. 
            

            
              
            

                    notification: notification_payload,
          
      635. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    635. 
            

            
              
            

                    data: data.merge(
          
      636. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    636. 
            

            
              
            

                      title: title,
          
      637. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    637. 
            

            
              
            

                      body: body,
          
      638. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    638. 
            

            
              
            

                      action: action,
          
      639. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    639. 
            

            
              
            

                      timestamp: Time.current.to_i
          
      640. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    640. 
            

            
              
            

                    ).compact,
          
      641. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    641. 
            

            
              
            

                    priority: priority,
          
      642. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    642. 
            

            
              
            

                    content_available: true,
          
      643. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    643. 
            

            
              
            

                    mutable_content: true # Allows notification service extension
          
      644. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    644. 
            

            
              
            

                  }
          
      645. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    645. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      646. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    646. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Add iOS-specific options
          
      647. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    647. 
            

            
              
            

                  payload[:apns] = {
          
      648. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    648. 
            

            
              
            

                    payload: {
          
      649. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    649. 
            

            
              
            

                      aps: {
          
      650. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    650. 
            

            
              
            

                        sound: critical ? "critical.caf" : "default",
          
      651. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    651. 
            

            
              
            

                        badge: calculate_badge_count(user)
          
      652. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    652. 
            

            
              
            

                      }
          
      653. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    653. 
            

            
              
            

                    },
          
      654. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    654. 
            

            
              
            

                    headers: {
          
      655. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    655. 
            

            
              
            

                      'apns-priority': priority == "high" ? "10" : "5",
          
      656. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    656. 
            

            
              
            

                      'apns-push-type': "alert"
          
      657. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    657. 
            

            
              
            

                    }
          
      658. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    658. 
            

            
              
            

                  }
          
      659. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    659. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      660. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    660. 
            

            
              
            

                  if critical
          
      661. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    661. 
            

            
              
            

                    payload[:apns][:payload][:aps]["sound"] = {
          
      662. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    662. 
            

            
              
            

                      critical: 1,
          
      663. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    663. 
            

            
              
            

                      name: "critical.caf",
          
      664. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    664. 
            

            
              
            

                      volume: 1.0
          
      665. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    665. 
            

            
              
            

                    }

              def extract_due_at(h)

                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                return parse_epoch(h[:dueDate]) if h.key?(:dueDate) # epoch seconds
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                return parse_time(h[:due_date]) if h.key?(:due_date) # ISO8601
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                return parse_time(h[:due_at])   if h.key?(:due_at)   # ISO8601
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                nil
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue ArgumentError
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                nil
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def parse_epoch(v)
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                return nil if v.blank?
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                Time.at(v.to_i)
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue ArgumentError
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                nil
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def parse_time(v)
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                return nil if v.blank?
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                case v
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                when Time   then v.in_time_zone
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

                when String
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                  begin
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

                    Time.iso8601(v).in_time_zone # preserves instant if "Z"/offset included
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

                  rescue ArgumentError
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

                    Time.zone.parse(v.to_s)
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue StandardError
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

                nil
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def set_default_values
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                @attrs[:strict_mode] = true if @attrs[:strict_mode].nil?
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      80.

                # Handle boolean attributes

    81. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0

                  else: 0

      84.

                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0

      85.

              def boolean(value)
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                case value
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when true, false then value
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when "true", "1", 1 then true
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                when "false", "0", 0, nil then false
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

                else false
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93.

            class CleanupCompletedTasksWorker
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

              include Sidekiq::Worker
          
      3.

      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              sidekiq_options queue: :low, retry: 1
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      6.

              def perform
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                # Optional: Archive or delete very old completed tasks
          
      8.

                # Be careful with this - users might want history!
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                cutoff_date = 1.year.ago

    11. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      12.

                # Find completed non-recurring tasks older than 1 year

                old_tasks = Task.where.not(completed_at: nil)

    20. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      21.

                # Instead of deleting, you might want to:
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                # 1. Move to archive table
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                # 2. Export to S3
          
      24.

                # For now, let's just log

              def perform

            class DailySummaryWorker
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

              include Sidekiq::Worker
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              sidekiq_options queue: :default, retry: 2
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

              def perform
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                current_hour = Time.current.hour
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "[DailySummaryWorker] Checking for summaries to send at hour #{current_hour}"
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                # Find relationships that want daily summaries at this hour
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                CoachingRelationship.active
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                                    .where(send_daily_summary: true)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                                    .where.not(daily_summary_time: nil)
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                                    .find_each do |relationship|
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                  summary_hour = relationship.daily_summary_time.hour
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Check if it's time to send (within this hour)
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                  if current_hour == summary_hour
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                    process_daily_summary(relationship)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "[DailySummaryWorker] Completed daily summary check"
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25.

              private

              def process_daily_summary(relationship)
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                today = Date.current
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                # Check if already sent today
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                existing_summary = relationship.daily_summaries.find_by(summary_date: today)
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                if existing_summary&.sent?
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "[DailySummaryWorker] Summary already sent for relationship ##{relationship.id} on #{today}"
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                  return
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "[DailySummaryWorker] Generating summary for relationship ##{relationship.id}"
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                begin
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

                  relationship.generate_daily_summary!(today)
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "[DailySummaryWorker] Successfully sent summary for relationship ##{relationship.id}"
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                rescue => e
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.error "[DailySummaryWorker] Error generating summary for relationship ##{relationship.id}: #{e.message}"
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.join("\n")
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      50.

              def perform
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "[ItemEscalationWorker] Starting escalation check at #{Time.current}"

    8. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                # Find all overdue tasks that can't be snoozed
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                overdue_tasks = Task.overdue
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                                    .where(can_be_snoozed: false)
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                                    .includes(:escalation, :list, :creator)

              def process_task_escalation(task)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                escalation = task.escalation || task.create_escalation!
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                # Calculate time since last notification
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                time_since_last = if escalation.last_notification_at
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                                    (Time.current - escalation.last_notification_at) / 60.0
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                                    999 # Force notification if never sent
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                # Check if it's time to send another notification
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                if time_since_last >= task.notification_interval_minutes
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "[ItemEscalationWorker] Escalating task ##{task.id}: '#{task.title}'"
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Increment notification count and update escalation level
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                  escalation.increment!(:notification_count)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                  escalation.update!(last_notification_at: Time.current)
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Mark as overdue if not already
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                  if escalation.became_overdue_at.nil?
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                    escalation.update!(became_overdue_at: Time.current)
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Check and update escalation level
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                  check_escalation_level(task, escalation)
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Send notification
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                  NotificationService.send_reminder(task, escalation.escalation_level)
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Check if we should notify coaches (at critical level)
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                  if escalation.escalation_level == "critical" && !escalation.coaches_notified?
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                    escalation.update!(coaches_notified: true, coaches_notified_at: Time.current)
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                    NotificationService.alert_coaches_of_overdue(task)
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Check if app should be blocked
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                  if task.should_block_app? && !escalation.blocking_app?
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.warn "[ItemEscalationWorker] Blocking app for task ##{task.id}"
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

                    start_blocking_app(task, escalation)
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue => e
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68.

                Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.join("\n")

      71.

              def check_escalation_level(task, escalation)
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

                minutes_overdue = task.minutes_overdue
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

                new_level = case task.priority
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

                when 3 # Urgent
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

                              if minutes_overdue > 120
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

                                "blocking"
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

                              elsif minutes_overdue > 60
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                                "critical"
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

                              elsif minutes_overdue > 30
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

                                "warning"
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

                              else
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

                                "normal"
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

                              end
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

                when 2 # High
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

                              if minutes_overdue > 240
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

                                "blocking"
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

                              elsif minutes_overdue > 120
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

                                "critical"
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

                              elsif minutes_overdue > 60
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

                                "warning"
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

                              else
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

                                "normal"
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

                              end
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

                else # Medium/Low
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

                              if minutes_overdue > 240
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

                                "critical"
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

                              elsif minutes_overdue > 120
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

                                "warning"
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

                              else
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

                                "normal"
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

                              end
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

                if new_level != escalation.escalation_level
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "[ItemEscalationWorker] Task ##{task.id} escalated from #{escalation.escalation_level} to #{new_level}"
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

                  escalation.update!(escalation_level: new_level)
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      111.

              def start_blocking_app(task, escalation)

                escalation.update!(

                # Send critical blocking notification

                NotificationService.app_blocking_started(task)

    120. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

                # Notify coaches immediately

    122. 
            

            
              
            

                unless escalation.coaches_notified?
          
      123.

            class LocationCheckWorker
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

              include Sidekiq::Worker
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              sidekiq_options queue: :critical, retry: 1
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

              def perform(user_id, latitude, longitude, accuracy = nil)
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                user = User.find(user_id)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "[LocationCheckWorker] Checking location for user ##{user_id} at (#{latitude}, #{longitude})"
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                # Save location record
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                user.user_locations.create!(
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                  latitude: latitude,
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                  longitude: longitude,
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                  accuracy: accuracy,
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                  recorded_at: Time.current
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                # Find location-based tasks for this user
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                location_tasks = Task.joins(:list)
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                                     .where(lists: { user_id: user.id })
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                                     .where(location_based: true)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                                     .where(completed_at: nil)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "[LocationCheckWorker] Found #{location_tasks.count} location-based tasks"
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                location_tasks.find_each do |task|
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                  check_task_location(task, latitude, longitude, user)
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "[LocationCheckWorker] User ##{user_id} not found"
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue => e
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "[LocationCheckWorker] Error: #{e.message}"
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.join("\n")
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

              private
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

              def check_task_location(task, user_lat, user_lng, user)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                # Calculate distance from user to task location
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

                distance = Geocoder::Calculations.distance_between(
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                  [ task.location_latitude, task.location_longitude ],
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                  [ user_lat, user_lng ],
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                  units: :km
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                ) * 1000 # Convert to meters
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                is_within = distance <= task.location_radius_meters
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                # Get user's previous location to determine if arriving or departing
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                previous_location = user.user_locations
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                                        .where("recorded_at < ?", 5.minutes.ago)
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                                        .order(recorded_at: :desc)
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                                        .first
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                was_within = if previous_location
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                               prev_distance = Geocoder::Calculations.distance_between(
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                                 [ task.location_latitude, task.location_longitude ],
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                                 [ previous_location.latitude, previous_location.longitude ],
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                                 units: :km
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                               ) * 1000
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                               prev_distance <= task.location_radius_meters
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

                               false
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

                # Determine event
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

                if is_within && !was_within && task.notify_on_arrival?
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

                  # User just arrived at location
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "[LocationCheckWorker] User arrived at location for task ##{task.id}"
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

                  NotificationService.location_based_reminder(task, :arrival)
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

                elsif !is_within && was_within && task.notify_on_departure?
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

                  # User just left location
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "[LocationCheckWorker] User departed from location for task ##{task.id}"
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

                  NotificationService.location_based_reminder(task, :departure)
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue => e
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "[LocationCheckWorker] Error checking task ##{task.id}: #{e.message}"
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      83.

              def perform
